name: TerraWalk at Babcock Ranch
description:
ABOUT THE HOME ENERGY RATING SCALE
The HERS (Home Energy Rating System) Index allows buyers to compare the relative energy efficiency of different homes. The HERS Index home energy rating is determined by an independent RESNET-certified home energy rater ("Rater"). The lower a home’s score, the more energy efficient it is in comparison to the HERS referenced home. For every one-point decrease in the HERS Index score, there is a corresponding one percent (1%) reduction in energy consumption as compared to a home with a HERS Index of 100. A home with a HERS score of 100 reflects a home built to 2006 IEEC Building Codes. See the bottom of this page for more information on HERS scores.

amenities.name: miles Publix
amenities.description: 1.5 miles to the Publix anchored Crescent B Commons which features a variety of restaurants where you can enjoy everything from Taco Tuesday to Pizza night or pick up coffee from the drive-thru Starbucks

amenities.name: miles Shoppes
amenities.description: 1.5 miles to The Shoppes at Yellow Pine which will feature a Marshalls, Ace Hardware, 5 Below, Oar & Iron, Verizon, and Seymour Orthodontics. Additional tenants will be announced in the coming months, including beauty supply, hair services, a spa, beauty and nail salon, an urgent care medical office, a med spa, pool supply and a gym. An array of dining establishments will provide morning-to-evening options, including a breakfast café, a dessert shop, a Thai restaurant, pizza shop and a seafood restaurant with patios, outdoor dining and gathering areas and a freestanding restaurant overlooking Sunset Lake

amenities.name: Square Footage
amenities.description: 3 miles to Founder’s Square which is the social hub of Babcock Ranch. It’s a central gathering place for neighbors and guests and the site of community events, music, and celebrations for all ages

amenities.name: Slaters Goods
amenities.description: Slaters Goods & Provisions is the Babcock Ranch neighborhood market, offering fresh produce, a salad bar, wine and a farm-fresh breakfast menu and more

amenities.name: Square Footage
amenities.description: If you’re craving caffeine or something sweet, Square Scoops ice creamery are steps away, and the nearby Lake House Kitchen + Bar offers residents a relaxing lakefront dining experience

amenities.name: Hatchery Babcock
amenities.description: The Hatchery is Babcock Ranch's office co-working space that offers a thoughtfully-designed place to work, meet, and collaborate. The Hatchery’s beautiful balcony view is perfect for taking a conference call or an office break for some fresh air

amenities.name: Square Footage
amenities.description: Escape the heat with the interactive Splash Pad at Founder's Square. It’s the perfect spot to cool down, entertain kids for hours , or enjoy the fountain lights at night

amenities.name: Square Footage
amenities.description: If you love music, the nearby band shell at Founder's Square is the perfect place to relax and enjoy live entertainment

If you’re craving caffeine or something sweet and Square Scoops ice creamery are steps away, and the nearby Lake House Kitchen + Bar offers residents a relaxing lakefront dining experience

amenities.description: Want to switch things up for dinner? From Taco Tuesday to Pizza night, Crescent B Commons has you covered with a variety of restaurants for lunch, Friday nights out, and everything in between

amenities.name: Nearby Jack
amenities.description: Nearby Jack Peeples Park, which includes 6 tennis courts, 4 pickleball courts, 2 bocce courts, and an open sports field

amenities.name: Near William
amenities.description: Near William and Mary Ann Smith Sports Complex, a regional park and outdoor sports facility offering a trailhead to Bill Hammond Trails, the sports complex will offer softball, baseball and multipurpose fields, a skate park, game night field, running track, expansive flex lawns and ample parking

amenities.name: Opportunities for
amenities.description: Opportunities for outdoor exploration are endless at Babcock Ranch. Once completed, the trail network will extend over 50 miles. Bike along the many lakes, explore Florida scrub brush, and find a route that you’ll love to walk, run, or bike day after day

amenities.name: Lake Bullhorn
amenities.description: Lake Bullhorn Park nearby offers a .25 mile trail along the lakeside

amenities.name: Furry friends
amenities.description: Furry friends will enjoy the dog park at Sunset Lake nearby which also features the Dick Cuda Trail, a 2 mile shell path around Sunset Lake
